author: Arab News
title: LuLu offers Eid promotions
text:
(MENAFN - Arab News) Lulu Hypermarket described as the lifestyle shopping destination of choice for many and the largest retail operator in the region has geared up for the Eid Al-Fitr celebration with major promotions on various items. 
A major promotion that is running throughout Ramadan is the LuLu Jaguar Dream Drive wherein customers can win 10 Jaguar sedan cars together with fabulous prizes of 150 Samsung and Philips products. 
Another promotion is the Zero Percent Easy Payment Plan in association with SABB Bank. Its tie-up with the bank is aimed to give its more than half million card holders the added advantage and flexibility of shopping now and paying later using their zero percent easy payment plan. 
Products covered under this scheme range from electronics IT and mobiles to home appliances and fitness accessories. 'There are unbelievable offers on electronics IT and mobiles during the Eid holidays' the company stated. 
Another promotion running at all LuLu outlets in Saudi Arabia is Get 5 percent Cash Back in association with ANB Bank. ANB Credit Card holders can get 5 percent cash back instantly against their purchase from LuLu outlets on all products. This will be an exclusive offer from LuLu for ANB Card holders and a large number can benefit from this promotion. 
Accompanying this promotion LuLu is offering Buy 2 Get 1 Free on garments footwear ladies bags and baby accessories. Together with this promotion there is a Toys Promotion which is running at all LuLu outlets in the Kingdom wherein customers can buy their favorite toys at attractive prices. 
This year's celebratory festivities are part of the hypermarket chain's initiative to always be part of the country's special occasions and to continuously bring the best of the world to their customers through providing the right products in the right place at the right time.
